Sejiro Avoseh (a mụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke bi na Canterbury, England

Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe a maara nke ọma maka njikọta aka ya nke ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na akụkụ ụgbọala site na iji eserese na usoro nchịkọta, Sejiro na-eme ihe osise ya site na magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ. Ọrụ Sejiro bụ akụkọ ndụ ya, na-enye olu dị egwu banyere ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke ndị ogbenye n'okpuru obodo ya, na n'ịdị elu na iji ike eme ihe n'aka ndị ọrụ ọhaneze na ndị isi a họpụtara ahọpụta.

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Lagos State Polytechnic na Lagos, Nigeria, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka Higher National Diploma na Creative Arts, Sejiro na-agụ akwụkwọ ugbu a maka Masters ya na Fine Art na Mahadum maka Creative Arts, Canterbury, Kent, England.
"When We Are Not What We Are." RELE Gallery, Lagos, Nigeria
Ihe ngosi ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eto eto
"Back to Base - Young Contemporaries Art Workshop for Students" na Badagry
ArtX Lagos, West Africa International Art Fair
Eccles Community Art Center, Utah, U.S
Ihe ngosi nke ndị na-eto eto
